DataElement.preferredName: Image Plane Column Image Orientation Z-Coordinate ISO21090.REAL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The position and orientation of the image slice relative to the patient-based coordinate system._An arrangement of objects one under another in a line.:Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:Position or alignment relative to points of the compass or other specific directions.:A third coordinate that is used together with horizontal (x) and vertical (y) coordinates to specify an exact point in a three dimensional space._Fractional numbers represented by decimals.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The position and orientation of the image slice relative to the patient-based coordinate system.

Concepts.definition: The position and orientation of the image slice relative to the patient-based coordinate system.

Property.preferredDefinition: An arrangement of objects one under another in a line.:Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:Position or alignment relative to points of the compass or other specific directions.:A third coordinate that is used together with horizontal (x) and vertical (y) coordinates to specify an exact point in a three dimensional space.

Concepts.definition: An arrangement of objects one under another in a line.
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
Position or alignment relative to points of the compass or other specific directions.
A third coordinate that is used together with horizontal (x) and vertical (y) coordinates to specify an exact point in a three dimensional space.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
